        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="53215" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="53215" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.23</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="4181">4,181</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="503"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Halloween Man X</b> by <b>Halloween</b> is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for men. <b>Halloween Man X</b> was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Nicolas Beaulieu. Top notes are Cardamom, Lavender and Lemon; middle notes are Coffee, Whiskey, Cinnamon, Leather and Mineral notes; base notes are Tonka Bean, Amber and Incense. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"To capture the sensual mystery of an urbanite night, Nicolas Beaulieu has created an addictive cocktail that awakens the senses and acts as an olfactory hook that catches you. The race begins with the fresh notes of Lemon, Cardamom and Lavandin and evolves towards a warm heart, where cinnamon bark and two chords created by the perfumer roar like an engine: Black Jack is a unique combination of Whisky, Roasted Coffee and Leather, while the mineral chord plays with the concrete of the city and vibrant amber notes. The background of the fragrance hides the gourmand soul of the Tonka Bean, the sensuality and character of modern Oriental and the oriental touch of Incense Smoke." - note from the brand</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html" </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="53215"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88630790722059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.63.jpg" style="width: 3.225rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cardamom-63.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cardamom</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.83058930759063; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 2.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78283876109963; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 2.7rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon</div></div></div>

    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/11796/news.11796-120x120.jpg" alt="Halloween Man X" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Halloween-Man-X-11796.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Halloween Man X</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Miguel Matos</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            01/18/19 09:12
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">11</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="53215"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.39</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="53215"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.19</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369179" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostnose2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostnose2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369179ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369179" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834">lostnose2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 05:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dig it. I am a sucker for cardamom and lavender. Great opening.  Coffee is there but not a stand out.  Hint of whisky and a Tonka amber base. Certainly would wear. Give it a shot if you haven't.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2369179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2369179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368454" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JosueAli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676361"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676361.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JosueAli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368454ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368454" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676361">JosueAli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this fragrance, I should really stop doing this but so far I havent missed because I absolutely love this fragrance, it starts out surprisingly blue and fresh with the lavender and lemon but then evolves into a sexy sweet burnt coffee smell, some people may not like that burnt coffee smell but I like it, I feel like its not too strong or overbearing and blends in well with the other notes, performance and sillage seem to be more than okay for me, especially for the cheap price.   <br />
Its the most unique fragrance in my collection so far and overall just a great winter fragrance to add to the collection, blind buy safe in my opinion but it doesnt hurt trying it out before you buy a bottle, an easy 10/10 for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2368454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2368454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2364492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2364492" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tervah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2340402"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tervah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2364492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2364492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2340402">Tervah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 18:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought Halloween Man X after hearing some hype and being tempted by the affordable price, but unfortunately, it was a complete miss for me. The scent came across as overwhelmingly cloying, and I didnt receive a single positive reaction while wearing it. The best I got were two neutral opinions, but the rest were negativemultiple people gave me disgusted looks, and others outright told me it wasnt a good scent.<br />
<br />
To top it off, multiple people asked if I was wearing Axe body spray, which I found disrespectful but admittedly kind of funny. I ended up giving it to my cousin to see if it might work better for him, but even then, he and the rest of my family disliked it when he sprayed it to test.<br />
<br />
While fragrance is subjective and this might work better for someone else, this was a total disappointment for me. Not worth the blind buy in my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2364492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2364492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2336607">Berbigan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 12:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a wonderful fragrance, smells great with a sweet opening and a roasted coffee on the dry down. I really love it a lot, although to be fair the sillage and performance could be a lot better. But for the price it's a must buy for the winter collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2360998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2360998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2360908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; </div></div><div id="parent2360237" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360237" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MacT0night"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052107"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2052107.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MacT0night" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052107">MacT0night</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 17:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Long story short, it smells really good. The beginning of the fragrance smells like a nice boujee body wash, eventually it dries down to a noticeable coffee smell. I recommend this in anybody's collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2360237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2360237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mcole500"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292897"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2292897.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mcole500" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2292897">mcole500</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Much fresher and brighter and bluer up front than I expected. Agree with the top notes of cardamom and lavender. Middle notes are more of a smooth vanilla-leather sweetness. Disappointed that the only coffee I get from it is a burnt and synthetic version. Don't get any whisky at all. <br />
Dry down is a synthetic vanilla coffee. Doesn't suit my taste</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2357713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2357713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354560" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Synthetic kinda. Not bad though. I wouldnt buy this for anything over 50. But its like a soapy coffee smell kinda, like a vanilla coffee body wash scrub kind of.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2354560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2354560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Munchiebar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327979"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Munchiebar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); I absolutely love this fragrance. At first I couldn't pickup the coffee until after a few days of wearing it and that's where i fell in love with it. I also receive a strong vanilla note from it. 100% worth it for the money, only downside is poor performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2353401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2353401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349912" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iggo2k"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2250254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iggo2k" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-Qahwa-88175.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88175.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah Qahwa"title="Khamrah Qahwa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2250254">iggo2k</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 09:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Prominent sour coffee-cherry note with whiskey and cardamom over-top a blue fragrance dna. One of the most unique in my collection.<br />
<br />
I blind-bought this one a while ago (my 3rd ever fragrance purchase) and have had a roller coaster journey with it since then.<br />
<br />
I was obsessed with this at first, then fell out of love for a while as the comments about a "urinal cake" note haunted me despite occupying only a short part of the dry-down. I picked it up again recently and I am back to loving it! I love coffee notes and this is the strongest (though very synthetic) and most unique in my collection. For the price it is pretty great and performance isn't as bad on my bottle as some have reported.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2349912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2349912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329735" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="destroydylan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2174786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2174786.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="destroydylan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-55785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau"title="Le Beau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329735ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329735" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); I don't hate it, but it's just kinda meh. It's good to check out for the price though for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2328322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2328322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327723" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Still pretty good value vs price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2327723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2327723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Funkincense"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2269746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2269746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Funkincense" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2269746">Funkincense</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's fantastic. Easy to enjoy. I don't mind the synthetics here. I like the this kinda cheap earthy soapy lavender that I feel brings out the mineral amber accord that I think is a very nice synthetic composition. With that great blackjack synthetic chord. It's just wonderful for this type of accessibility. It flirts with a coffee smell but I wouldn't say it stands out but it's playing an important role. 8.5/10. A+.  gets compliments, easy recommendation from me. I reach for this often over many higher quality frags. It's quite a bit different than Ferragamo Uomo, &amp; Signature. Not redundant to have all three. I'm happy to use them all regularly in the fall and nights.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2318139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2318139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314279" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ASHRAF RAAFAT ADLY MIKHAI"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ASHRAF RAAFAT ADLY MIKHAI" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Tony-Iommi-Monkey-Special-70789.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70789.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tony Iommi Monkey Special"title="Tony Iommi Monkey Special"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314279ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314279" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538752">ASHRAF RAAFAT ADLY MIKHAI</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Shiity performance. <br />
Good smell. <br />
Inc. Coffee</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2314279"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2314279#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312161" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vedaant"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2220959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2220959.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vedaant" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2220959">Vedaant</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Successful blindbuy, but be careful if you arent into coffee, because it smells like the inside a coffee shop,<br />
and its surprisingly quite versatile since i get a hint of freshness aswell but its majorly more gourmand winter-suited, even a little mature scent. Its as if you took YSL Y edt, toned it down to around 10% potency, removed the citruses and fresh spices, and added vanilla(tonka bean actually), whiskey, a little just a little bit of sandalwood, and some coffee. The opening is a bit bitter but as it dries down it gets a little sweet and creamy, and the mineral notes show once its almost gone, and theyre nothing but a bit metallic on this one but very well blended. Longevity is nice, sillage is decent though it drops after 2hours a little, it sits close to the skin and does the job. Autumn/Winter fragrance imo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2312161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2312161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309686" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309686" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The AntiChrist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1366740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1366740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The AntiChrist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309686ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309686" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1366740">The AntiChrist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 02:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I left a review earlier but wanted to add (if I didn't), the comments here are confusing to me because a lot of people are saying it smells like Eros... It doesn't. Like at all. <br />
<br />
Some are saying they smell no coffee?<br />
<br />
I smell aloooot of coffee in this. When I first got my bottle it smelled more like coffee but I guess my bottle macerated because I'm picking up some cool vanilla playing in the background. It's sweeter than when I first sprayed it... Still have not debuted this outside yet but it piqued my interest today... I imagine this will layer really well fresh out of a shower with a vanilla body wash and maybe a Shea butter moisturizer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2309686"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2309686#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309499" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303629" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smellsgoodman66"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211179"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="smellsgoodman66" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2211179">smellsgoodman66</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The coffee in this is really prominent, though one of my coworkers said they couldn't smell it while the others very easily smelt it. I do think it's a skin chemistry thing as coffee tends to come out pretty well on my skin. I don't really get any of the incense but there's a clean smell there; the cardamom, lemon and coffee are going to be the strongest in this with some lavender if you're checking for it. The dry down is delicious to me, slightly boozy coffee smell. The longevity isn't the greatest, but the scent bubble is very nice. Possibly not a great blind buy if you're not into coffee much, but if you enjoy a shower gel smell, you'd probably be into this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/458500">ecojoe69</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 07:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing bad or critical to say here.  To me, this smells just like your typical designer-esque scent of day.  Pleasant and spicy and sexy but with a coffee note that wasn't there at first (masked by the amber) then WAS there after about 20 minutes and now seems to be gone again after an hour.<br />
For a cheapie, definitely one to check out but it seems to me like a light AMen and I don't need it in my collection.  Anyone up for a swap?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2299967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2299967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2297808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MattyFrag09"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2187674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2187674.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MattyFrag09" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2297808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2297808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2187674">MattyFrag09</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-28">09/28/24 06:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opened this morning, 2 sprays on the hand, dont put nose up to it for 5 seconds or alcohol will get you. However pleasant smell and I get the hype, coffee subtle but pick it up upon initial spray, comes forward more but not powerful in the mid, and stays that way through dry down. The rest blends well with the scent but I imagine you are buying this because of the coffee hype. And for 25-30 dollars yes it is worth the hype and nice smelling fragrance and blind buy worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2297808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2297808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2295160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2295160" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2295160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2295160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 19:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you're looking for a heavy coffee frag, this ain't it. No discernable coffee notes in the opening, but can almost pick up on some on the back end of an inhale during the dry down. In other words, if there is coffee in there somewhere, it's very muted.<br />
<br />
Performance is relatively lackluster. The scent itself is somewhat synthetic, but pleasant nonetheless. Would recommend trying if you're on a budget. Otherwise there are better options in this category.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2295160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2295160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2291298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2291298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Koolthisshit2222"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134777"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2134777.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Koolthisshit2222" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Beau-De-Jour-Eau-de-Parfum-59064.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59064.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum"title="Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2291298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2291298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134777">Koolthisshit2222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-22">09/22/24 06:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like burned coffe and moldy bread</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2291298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2291298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286361" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286361" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Felixthreeone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1753657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Felixthreeone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Uden-Overdose-52433.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52433.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uden Overdose"title="Uden Overdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286361ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286361" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753657">Felixthreeone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is a winner. Performance is good, projection is good, and it smells great. I'm not sure how much I consider this to be a 'coffee' fragrance, though. I seem to find more in the Ferragamo offerings (both Uomo and Signature), as well as Gentleman Society Extreme. And I truly believe the statements regarding this being 'synthetic' are a bit overdone. I've smelled 'niche' stuff that was supposedly high-quality naturals that smelled more artificial. All boils down to the blending, I guess. Either way, I find this to be an incredible value for less than $40USD (many cases much less than this). It does get a fair bit of positive attention, provided you don't go too crazy with the trigger. Another thing I noted, is that it smells considerably different on paper than on skin. I'm going to be wearing this a lot during the upcoming fall season.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2286361"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2286361#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283608" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; First time ever getting complimented on my fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2283608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2283608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281149" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2281149"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2281149#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280073" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blessed_U"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226682"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2226682.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blessed_U" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226682">Blessed_U</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 04:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Having bought this perfume two weeks ago, I want to share my impressions of it. In my opinion, this is a bold blind purchase for those who love coffee. As a coffee lover, I was pleased with my purchase. For its price, this is simply a wonderful aroma, but it cannot be done without disadvantages. As already mentioned in the review, the aroma of coffee is slightly synthetic, and over time it begins to get boring and even slightly irritate. Many people talk about this, and I will also say - the coffee in this perfume feels slightly burnt, which can spoil your impression of it. Speaking about whether it is worth buying this perfume, I will say that it is definitely worth it. If your budget is somewhere around 30-40 Euros, then this will be one of the best options for autumn and winter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2280073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2280073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277465" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="?????fender"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2001804.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="?????fender" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277465ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277465" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2001804">?????fender</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 18:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is pretty bad a headache inducing but, right after it settles for 30 minutes it is a pretty good fragrance. Great winter scent and very warm. I completely understand how people get a headache from it so make sure to go easy on the sprays. Overall good winter fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2277465"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2277465#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275941" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dr Harder"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323531"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1323531.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dr Harder" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Iceberg/Change-The-Flow-78268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Change The Flow"title="Change The Flow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275941ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275941" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); Whether thats a good or a bad thing I have no idea</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2275941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2275941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273746" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2273746" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rehaan4397"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100720"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rehaan4397" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2273746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2273746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2100720">rehaan4397</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-06">09/06/24 10:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first designer perfume and a blind buy too. My nose was sooooo unsure of what this was trying to be at first, because the coffee + blue notes together are confusing. But, it ended up surprising me and its already the become the most used perfume in my collection. <br />
<br />
Coffee notes really dont last long and I wish it did, but the dry down smells like blue curacao syrup + liqueur and Im a HUGE fan of that. I get whiffs of coffee every now and then, and it smells surprisingly great in the mix. My signature scent from now on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2273746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2273746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2273387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The AntiChrist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1366740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1366740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="The AntiChrist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1366740">The AntiChrist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just got this in the mail. <br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Yes this is fire!!!! I won't go into a long review because I just got it but oh my God this is going to be a banger in the fall and the winter. I can already tell. The thing I love about this is it gives me a nostalgic mall smell. Like when you're at the food court type of smell? Not a food type smell but if you know, you know. It's the coffee note. <br />
<br />
It's crazy because I don't even like coffee but I love the smell of it. This is just reaaaallly nice. I love it! <br />
<br />
Don't take my word for it. Because if I would have taken the word of the bad reviews I wouldn't have this amazing fragrance. It's amazing!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2266022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2266022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is barely any citrus but it got some lavender. I wore this the whole day and god was it giving me a headache.
