<br />
2/10 for trying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2259725"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2259725#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2258842" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thejermblackwell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206486"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2206486.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thejermblackwell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2258842ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2258842" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2206486">thejermblackwell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a fan. Smells very warm and inviting. Unfortunately, you get a whiff of synthetic coffee every now and then that throws you off a bit. Great value though, don't really understand the hate</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2258842"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2258842#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254124" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It feels cheap for me, not because of the coffee note (on my skin I get a really smooth caramelised coffee bean type of smell, like a coffee candy) but because of the way it is blended, just doesnt smell natural, kinda out of place. It doesnt make it a bad one as it is super cheap and still very pleasant. Imo it is a safe and versatile scent and i would rate it a 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2243829"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2243829#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302361">albinerikssonnn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 08:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2232649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2232649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229376" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xaki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1594515.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xaki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1594515">xaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halloween Man X, by all means, is a blue fragrance. The whole vibe of this fragrance regardless of the notes you see before you is a blue fresh synthetic fragrance, reminiscent of Axe body spray. Nonetheless, I do think this is a really nice fragrance, synthetic yes,  but it smells mass appealing and pleasant. You cant really go wrong with it. When you really try to analyze the scent you can pick out something along the lines of coffee, with a bit of spice, but no ones gonna be able to pick that apart around you hahaha. For the price its a no brainer. If you used to wear Axe body spray when you were younger and want a grown up version of that experience then this is your choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2229376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2229376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dgjeans"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2039986"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2039986.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="dgjeans" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Black-Phoenix-Alchemy-Lab/Technical-Boy-44858.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44858.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Technical Boy"title="Technical Boy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2039986">dgjeans</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dang, some people blew the "synthetic" smell out of proportion. I have to wonder if it's partly a result of people being influenced by earlier reviews and just sort of smelling what they had already expected to smell based on what they read. The mineral note could definitely be to blame as well, but that's always been a rather pleasant scent to me, so I don't have a problem with it. Also synthetic does not equal bad.<br />
The coffee note is very nicely incorporated. I was scared to try this based on the more hysterical reviews, but I ended up loving it. Great at any price!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2222384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2222384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221504" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Good day/night fall/winter fragrance. Kinda harsh synthetic but I wouldnt knock it until you try it. Definitely not a safe blind buy but it's blind buy possible if that makes sense.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2221504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2221504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670625">IronRelative</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 15:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got to smell this when it came out and didn't buy it because I was using a lot of CH Bad Boy and felt a similar vibe, and it was really hard to get for a while and not many stores knew about it, so I got it as soon as I saw it back in stock. <br />
Safe sweet coffee smell, got many compliments and for the price its been a very pleasant experience. This would make a very good gift to any man, my favorite Halloween and I could wear this any day of the year. I feel that if you have CH Bad Boy or CH 212 Vip Black this wont bring anything new.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2216813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2216813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214735" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I wasn't fond of this at first, but coming back to it after a couple months, it has become as good as I expected when I heard the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201890" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gaboich"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gaboich" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Oajan-21548.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21548.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oajan"title="Oajan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201890ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201890" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1984964">Gaboich</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like a mix of Azzaro TMW edp and versace eros from the cap but on skin it smells like Aromatic synthetic coffee</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2201890"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2201890#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198994" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Semsir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Semsir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1491221">Semsir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spray this a few times, wait a month or two and you have quite a nice fragrance. It becomes better when macerated or aged for a bit even though there is not that much vanilla in here.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2198994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2198994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182859" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bunn100"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2129907.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bunn100" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182859ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182859" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2129907">bunn100</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-09">06/09/24 07:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halloween Man X is like the rebellious younger brother of the fragrance worldbold, edgy, and always up for a good time. Released as the 10th edition of the Halloween Man series, this scent promises to be your ticket to smelling like the life of the party, even if the closest youve been to a wild night lately is binge-watching Netflix in your pajamas.<br />
<br />
Scent Profile<br />
The fragrance opens with a burst of fresh lemon, cardamom, and cinnamon. Picture this: youre walking into a haunted house party, and someone hands you a cocktail thats equal parts spicy, zesty, and intriguing. Its like being hit with a burst of energy that makes you feel like you could dance until dawnor at least until your feet start hurting.<br />
<br />
As the initial excitement settles, youre greeted by a mix of coffee and lavender. Now youre lounging in a cozy corner of the party, sipping a cup of freshly brewed espresso while a lavender-scented candle flickers nearby. Its warm, comforting, and makes you feel like youve found your own little oasis in the midst of the chaos.<br />
<br />
The dry down features tonka bean, patchouli, and amber. Imagine yourself wrapped in a velvet cloak, surrounded by the smoky scent of incense and the warm glow of candlelight. Its mysterious, seductive, and makes you feel like youre the protagonist of your own gothic romance novelminus the brooding heroics, hopefully.<br />
<br />
Longevity and Sillage<br />
Halloween Man X has staying power that rivals the undeadit lasts for a solid 8-10 hours. The sillage is moderate, meaning you wont be the guy who announces his presence with a fog of cologne, but people will definitely take notice when you walk into the room. Its the kind of scent that leaves an impression without overpowering the senseslike a ghostly whisper in the night.<br />
<br />
Versatility<br />
This fragrance is as versatile as a shape-shifter. Perfect for nights out on the town, spooky-themed parties, or just adding a touch of mystery to your everyday routine. Its bold enough to make a statement but subtle enough to wear anytime, anywhere. Whether youre channeling your inner vampire or just feeling a bit rebellious, Halloween Man X has got you covered.<br />
<br />
Overall Impressions<br />
Halloween Man X is for the guy who wants to smell like hes just stepped out of a Tim Burton moviedark, mysterious, and undeniably cool. Its spicy, warm, and perfect for adding a touch of gothic glamour to your fragrance game. So go ahead, give yourself a spritz, and get ready to unleash your inner party monster.<br />
<br />
In conclusion, Halloween Man X is like wearing a costume party on your skin. Its bold, its edgy, and its perfect for anyone who wants to stand out in a crowd. So go ahead, spray it on, and get ready to make every night feel like Halloweenminus the candy corn, hopefully.  Just be aware that the coffee note may not be everyones cup of, well, coffee.<br />
<br />
Sniff-O-Meter Score<br />
<br />
Scent Appeal: 3 - Spicy and warm, but with a hint of clich.<br />
Longevity: 3 - Lasts through a good chunk of the evening.<br />
Sillage: 3 - Leaves a moderate scent trail.<br />
Uniqueness: 3 - Decent, but not breaking any new ground.<br />
Versatility: 4 - Works for various occasions, from casual to semi-formal.<br />
<br />
Overall Sniff-O-Meter Score: 16/25</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2182859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2182859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175524" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NauticaVoyageFan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114601"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114601.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NauticaVoyageFan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Oud-Cadenza-95195.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95195.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Cadenza"title="Oud Cadenza"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114601">NauticaVoyageFan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halloween Man X by Halloween is what you would expect for an EDT for its price and while this scent is good it merely is just average in comparison to other fragrances so don't expect anything special if you were this fragrance. I do like a good coffee scent which is prominent in this fragrance but many of the notes listed above do not show in this scent. Overall this is a good daily fragrance and a good option for a low-budget fragrance (even if there are better options).<br />
<br />
As an EDT it won't last as long as you would expect and won't get you throughout a whole day out but what I do like about this fragrance is that you can smell this from a mile away and it does fill up the room when just applied.<br />
<br />
Scent: 6/10<br />
Performance: 4/10<br />
Longevity: 5/10<br />
Sillage: 7/10<br />
Price: 7/10<br />
Blind Buy Safe: 5/10<br />
Overall: 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2175524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2175524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2171017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2171017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169697" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169697" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Doodoofart"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Doodoofart" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-Hero-66200.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66200.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halloween Man Hero"title="Halloween Man Hero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169697ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169697" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2132062">Doodoofart</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-27">05/27/24 17:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first review and Im still generally new to fragrances so take this with a grain of salt but I believe Halloween man x is a good fragrance aside from the opening which I kind of find to be a little strong and slightly annoying to the nose but the dry down smells amazing and for me personally it can easily last around 10 or more hours on my skin just maybe not as strong as it was I did blind buy this and generally I am happy about it but I wouldnt recommend you to blind buy because as Ive said in the beginning the opening note can be annoying and strong to some and you might not like the coffee notes (I will also let this macerate for a 2-3 more weeks as I have noticed the opening has got less annoying to me since I first got it 2 weeks ago)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2169697"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2169697#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167806" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167806" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="javiercruzgh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2038575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="javiercruzgh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-de-Parfum-48100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"title="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167806ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167806" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038575">javiercruzgh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, I was expecting something completely different. The opening is straight up synthetic and smells like lavender laundry detergent, the coffee note (which seems to be the star here) takes way too long to show up and it's not memorable at all once it does.<br />
<br />
I'll pass.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2167806"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2167806#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165690" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SillageMarauder"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SillageMarauder" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761804">SillageMarauder</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 14:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is a bit strange it tries to be a blue shower gel fragrance and a coffee gourmand at the same time. The coffee feels out of place but after it dries down the notes blend better together.<br />
<br />
Performance is not the best though; having 5-6 hours of longevity with around 1.5 hours of decent projection. This can work as a colder weather daytime scent but I wouldn't wear it as a going out fragrance because of the soft projection.<br />
<br />
Overall it's nothing super interesting nor bad smelling. Pretty generic synthetic blue shower gel fragrance with an added sour coffee note. Good blind buy for people who don't have a lot of fragrances and are on a tight budget but still want to smell nice. Great for teenagers and young people. Considering the price it's a solid 6/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2165690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2165690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160144" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YaGirlSniffsMe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1171227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1171227.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YaGirlSniffsMe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Kalan-56036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kalan"title="Kalan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); One of my most regretted blind buys because its just smells of a migraine. This smells nothing like the most wanted intense edp same catagory of fragrances Id say yes but same DNA or ball park not at all similar. It doesnt stink but just smells of a headache and not blended well. This is something thats pleasant to smell for like a few seconds but nothing Id want to smell on me all day. Its harsh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2160144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2160144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151678" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think the coffee note smells really cheap. Try before buying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2133740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2133740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132446" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vincentsilva305"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1866937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vincentsilva305" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132446ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132446" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1866937">vincentsilva305</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 06:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first got it, it was great. However, after a while, the synthetic nature of the fragrance gave me crazy headaches. I wouldn't recommend it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2132446"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2132446#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1291349.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-01-845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 01"title="Molecule 01"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291349">TonyG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have an almost full bottle of this for swap or sale.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2131593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2131593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128656" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Despotes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1909763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Despotes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Aoud-Lemon-Mint-39181.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39181.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aoud Lemon Mint"title="Aoud Lemon Mint"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1909763">Despotes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well!<br />
Apparently it's different for everyone and opinions are very diverse. Many of the reviewers below are probably used to more expensive and quality fragrances, but let's not forget that this is a $25-$30 fragrance! I also have and have had many designer perfumes, but I can't help but share my good impression of this one! Indeed, the price-quality ratio is very good! I'm just surprised it's selling for that price. This fragrance could easily sell for $100. There are much more expensive perfumes that are also very synthetic and downright a total disappointment for the money!<br />
I think this one is totally worthy of an everyday perfume, not so much for formal occasions, that can completely replace one of its more expensive counterparts in everyday life.<br />
I personally use it for short outings - to the store or in the neighborhood or for a walk and it has brought me many compliments and a good feeling.<br />
I have no qualms about occasionally wearing a cheaper fragrance. This to me is a lovely chippy with its own charm!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2128656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2128656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128141" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128141" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mehrdad.Sh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1793336"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1793336.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mehrdad.Sh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128141ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128141" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2128141"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2128141#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MegaMatthew08"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2095089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MegaMatthew08" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-16657.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16657.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros"title="Eros"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2095089">MegaMatthew08</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 16:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a pretty good fragrance IF you are under the age of 25 years old. The sweetness makes it a little immature for older folks.<br />
<br />
That said, this is probably the most fun scent in my collection, and it is a great compliment puller! Since it is such a powerful scent, many people will DEFINITELY notice you!<br />
<br />
Scent: 7.5/10<br />
Performance:9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2123930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2123930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; synthetic, reminded me of Davidoff Hot Water. Then after a while it turns into burnt coffee grounds and urinal cakes. I really wish I was picking up what others are smelling, because I wanted to love this! So glad I opted for the sample and didn't blind buy a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2117793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2117793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115600" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShimmySoup"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShimmySoup" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah"title="Khamrah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115600ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115600" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085937">ShimmySoup</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 15:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like the dentist to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2115600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2115600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2114387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2114387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="slumbergr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2084610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2084610.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="slumbergr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2114387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2114387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2084610">slumbergr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Be careful with this! If you're thinking about buying this, get a sample first and don't even consider a blind buy! The coffee note has a synthetic, slightly plastic smell and it may cause headaches and nausea. Not my cup of tea, but I can see the appeal (the top notes smell decent).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2114387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2114387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113109" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113109" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chillyal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2042045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chillyal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-228.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.228.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit"title="Fahrenheit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042045">chillyal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 10:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halloween Man X is a mesmerizing olfactory journey that captivates the senses with its enigmatic blend of warm, spicy notes. From the moment it touches the skin, it exudes an aura of mystery and sophistication, inviting you into a world of intrigue and allure.<br />
<br />
Upon the initial spray, one is greeted by a harmonious medley of aromas, each note seamlessly blending into the next. The warmth of amber envelops the senses, setting the stage for the unfolding olfactory symphony. As the fragrance develops, the rich and robust aroma of coffee emerges, adding depth and complexity to the composition. It evokes images of cozy cafes on brisk autumn mornings, with steam rising from freshly brewed cups.<br />
<br />
Interwoven with the coffee is the intoxicating scent of whiskey, lending a sultry and seductive quality to the fragrance. It's as if you're sipping on a smooth, aged whiskey by a crackling fireplace, surrounded by the comforting embrace of vanilla and cinnamon. These sweet, spicy notes dance together in perfect harmony, creating an irresistible allure that is both comforting and captivating.<br />
<br />
Throughout its wear, Halloween Man X evolves on the skin, revealing different facets of its character with each passing moment. It's a fragrance that commands attention without being overpowering, making it suitable for any occasion, whether it's a casual day out or a sophisticated evening affair.<br />
<br />
In essence, Halloween Man X is more than just a fragrance; it's a statement of confidence and refinement. With its alluring blend of warm, spicy notes, it invites you to embrace the magic of the season and unleash your inner allure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2113109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2113109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930929">Justin Taylor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this one because of the reviews and my son and I had liked the original Halloween Man. We were a little disappointed with this one. My son who had received my bottle of the original Halloween Man, did not like this one at all, and neither did my wife. Gave it away to a friend of the family, who did seem to like it better than anyone in my household.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2110793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2110793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2106584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; On my skin this smells like a mess of some sweet ambery notes, and very weird sour synthetic note, that barely smells like coffee. The price is dirt cheap, I bought a 15ml travel size for 7 euros. On clothes however, it smells somewhat nicer, the coffee is much more pleasant, but it still smells incredibly cheap and synthetic, but much more likeable</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Its a great scent even if it is a bit overhyped, and its quite situational as well. This wouldnt be a signature scent in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2099937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2099937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
