padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1831372">SaadAnwer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 11:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While I do like this fragrance, I don't see why big influencers like Fragrance Knowledge hype it up so much. Especially because the coffee note did not come out on my skin at all. The opening is super strong, but longevity is poor, it p much becomes a skin scent after 30-45 mins (I typically use 4 sprays)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2096342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2096342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091950" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091950" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leiknma"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2038820.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leiknma" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091950ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091950" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2038820">Leiknma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Others may not agree, but to me, this is JPG Ultra Male with a bitter coffee note in the front rather than than that powdery, sweet opening you get with Ultra Male. It also dries down to a more refined leather note than the vanilla that Ultra Male leaves behind. The sweet base is definitely there, but to me, this the not overly-sweet coffee note I was looking for thats so difficult to find in perfumery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2091950"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2091950#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087407" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087407" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="d_cala09"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2005716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="d_cala09" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Flame-52180.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52180.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Flame"title="Eros Flame"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087407ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087407" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2005716">d_cala09</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this fragrance is AMAZING<br />
the coffee notes make me crazy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2087407"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2087407#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2086967" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2086967" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zsemlemorzsa1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936899"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1936899.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zsemlemorzsa1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2086967ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2086967" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1936899">Zsemlemorzsa1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely LOVE this fragrance!<br />
It is one of my favourites in my collection. <br />
<br />
It Smells like Versace Eros with coffee for me and it is absolutlely lovely. I love the roasted coffee smell in this one. It smells very cozy and sweet, almost drinkable.<br />
<br />
Longevity is okay arround 6-7 hours, sillage is also okay, noticable but not strong at all.<br />
I have gotten multiple compliments on this fragrance, but they had to be close to smell it.<br />
<br />
Very nice cheap winter fragrance, well worth the hype!<br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2086967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2086967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2083818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065205" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexslam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003414"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2003414.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexslam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065205ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065205" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2003414">alexslam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 11:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really nice roasted coffee scent on the dry down mixed with warm spicy sweetness!<br />
 <br />
The first time I wore this I couldn't get any coffee scent from it, after trying it again it's overwhelmingly spicy coffee (which i love!)<br />
<br />
May not be a safe blind buy if you don't love coffee smells, but if you do and generally go for masculine scents this is worth a try<br />
<br />
I layer this with Vanille by Solinote to really bring out a gourmand sweetness, almost like a vanilla latte</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2065205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2065205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063718" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentNSent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587762"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentNSent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063718ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063718" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587762">ScentNSent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 21:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A semi-sweet coffee fragrance. This one grew into me over time and while I think this is just okay, could be a good daily wear for winter or fall if youre on a budget. Something about this coffee fragrance does turn me off though. Like some people state smelling a sort of burnt smell to it? I get that as well. While it doesnt dominate the fragrance at all, that burnt coffee smell is still there, not sure what to make of it but still a decent smelling fragrance. Id give it a 6.8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2063718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2063718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061484" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceAnon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceAnon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915">FragranceAnon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this a while back and forgot to write a review after testing.<br />
<br />
Count me with the people who find the coffee note bitter and unappealing. It was not enjoyable to me at all.<br />
<br />
If you're into very sweet fragrances, you'll probably enjoy the sweetness under the coffee, which remains long after the coffee is gone, but I wasn't feeling it.<br />
<br />
This is a pass for me on the grounds (pun intended) of the foul coffee note and being too sweet for me.<br />
<br />
I was really tempted to blind buy it after seeing all the glowing reviews, but I'm glad I didn't.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2061484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2061484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2056429" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2056429" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Carlos Danger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254070"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254070.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Carlos Danger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-Platinum-614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste Platinum"title="Egoiste Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2056429ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2056429" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254070">Carlos Danger</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-08">02/08/24 14:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a decent value, but is way too sweet and synthetic for my own taste. To me it comes off as very attention-grabbing and youthful (in a bad way). There are better coffee frags out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2056429"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2056429#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2054234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2054234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="imKingRami"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1943234.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="imKingRami" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-Shock-For-Him-12520.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12520.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One Shock For Him"title="CK One Shock For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2054234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2054234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1943234">imKingRami</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-06">02/06/24 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the smell of Coffee so I recently blind bought this fragrance. My expectations were really high until I smelled the coffee note. <br />
It kind of smelled like a burnt coffee in a way Im not sure how else to describe it. <br />
All the other notes in there are fantastic it is just that coffee note that doesnt do it for me. <br />
<br />
I tried to give it a second chance today but it just got worse. The smell is very headache inducing and it makes my stomach hurt as well. <br />
Overall Id give it a 6.5/10. <br />
It could be higher if that coffee note was more pleasant to the nose. <br />
I got about 8+ hours longevity. I dont regret buying it but hopefully I can get used to the smell. <br />
I really wish I can like this fragrance more.<br />
<br />
Price = 9/10<br />
Scent = 5/10<br />
Bottle = 7/10<br />
Longevity = 8+ hrs<br />
Sillage = Moderate/Strong</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2054234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2054234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1760441">Pinochles</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>was excited to get this one but underwhelmed. very good performance but smells like the inside of a starbucks (which isnt a bad thing). i just cant find a time/occasion to wear it. oh well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2051977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2051977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cornflakesenjoyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906668"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1906668.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cornflakesenjoyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Hermann-a-mes-Cotes-me-Paraissait-une-Ombre-34730.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34730.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermann  mes Cts me Paraissait une Ombre"title="Hermann  mes Cts me Paraissait une Ombre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906668">cornflakesenjoyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i macerated this guy and its even better but like its a great winter scent up here in canada but i think i smell more of the lavender than the coffee on my arm</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2050324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2050324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050049" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050049" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshzcents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768322"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1768322.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshzcents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Coach/Coach-Blue-60332.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60332.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coach Blue"title="Coach Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050049ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050049" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768322">Marshzcents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Writing a 2nd review after my bottle fully macerated:<br />
This is what Eros Parfum should've been, but it is not. I find any Eros flanker redundant, they all smell the same other than Flame and that one also smells like Eros but spicier, this is different and more unique I'd say. <br />
This fragrance is beautiful for the price, quality is decent, I'd say the worst part is the opening and it's not really bad, just the only "synthetic" part of it. It's got a blue, bubblegummy sweet opening with a nice lemony accord that never truly overpowers the nose, lavender, amber and tonka bean dominate for about 15-20 minutes before the mid part of the fragrance. In the mid is when coffee starts to be present, whisky and cinnamon, as well as the mineral notes and spicyness of the incense are noticeable but do not stick out as much as the lavender, this is definitely a blue fragrance/gourmand hybrid kind of ordeal.<br />
 I'd say I like the far dry down a bit more than the mid, it is when the leather, the coffee and the vanilla shine. I love this so much, it is versatile but can be cloying in the summer or high heat/humidity environments. I'd go for 4-6 sprays in cooler weather and 3 for the heat. 8hrs+ longevity with strong projection and strong sillage, way too good for an EDT, I have EDPs and Parfums that perform worse than this little puppy right here. As to similarities I get a mix of Versace Eros Parfum / One Million Lucky without the plum and added woodiness with a roasted coffee note and much more vanilla without the annoying green apple that Eros has on all of its varieties.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2050049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2050049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046252" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046252" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MxZero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360163"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360163.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MxZero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Ocean-68753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Ocean "title="Luna Rossa Ocean "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046252ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046252" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360163">MxZero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 20:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this because I love the smell of coffee and heard good things about this. This is trash. It smells messy and confused, as if they were trying to make the opening fresh. It smells like a coffee shop's bathroom, specifically urinal deodorizers. The dry down is a little better, but it still smells like those $20 generic colognes at a teen clothing store. The coffee notes fight with the fresh notes and smells just confused. I'd use it as bathroom air freshener if the opening was the dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2046252"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2046252#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2042862" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JonnyBadass"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1235873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JonnyBadass" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1899-Hemingway-18846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1899 Hemingway"title="1899 Hemingway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2042862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2042862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235873">JonnyBadass</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-26">01/26/24 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was expecting to be able to pick out the coffee note here, but I cant really detect it, so that was a bit disappointing. It is a very pleasant warm and spicy sweet scent at a bargain price, nonetheless. My girlfriend said it smelled like root beer, but in a good way. I can see where shes coming from. I was once wearing this at a restaurant and a woman stopped me and asked what I was wearing. She said it smelled so good every time I walked past. The two other women with her agreed. So it definitely has a great compliment factor. Id say if you enjoy the Born In Roma line, the Stronger With You line, or the Azzaro Wanted line, you will more than likely enjoy this one as well. If youre balling on a budget this is a fantastic alternative to all of those scents. I do find this type of scent DNA to be a bit overdone these days and if I want this kind of scent profile I usually reach for Azzaro The Most Wanted EDP, so this may not be getting much use for me. 6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2042862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2042862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037289" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bizzy1995"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bizzy1995" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963702">Bizzy1995</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 05:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very warm soft spice with notes of cofee. The cinnamon and mineral notes are prevalent on the dry down. Ambery Tonka sweetness with a touch of whiskey. For the price this is a no brainer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2037289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2037289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029967" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029967" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sgtnugget25"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1970780.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sgtnugget25" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Ani-54785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ani"title="Ani"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029967ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029967" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970780">Sgtnugget25</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-13">01/13/24 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This honestly smells like dark coffee and rootbeer on my skin, it smells pretty good but I definitely wouldnt say its great</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2029967"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2029967#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2029642" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="makosstesszta"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1883414"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1883414.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="makosstesszta" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2029642ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2029642" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1883414">makosstesszta</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-13">01/13/24 06:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its not bad, but its not that 'wow', recently it got pretty overrated on social platforms.<br />
The roasted coffee note is very hardly perceptible, in some conditions it has a soapy smell.<br />
The performance is way more worse than they say on reviews, the projection is like less than 50cm, the longevity is like 9-10 hour but why it would matter if almost no one can feel it around you?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1618581">roccodrigo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A year since I blind bought this, first I did kinda like it but it remind me of something from my teen years and then I found it smells like the Playboy New York Deodorant I had in 2013, exactly like that<br />
Gave it a "couple" more tries (more like 10 tries), and nope, I just don't like it<br />
An okay scent, do not expect a realistic coffee, it smells like a 7-11 one<br />
Nothing innovative, or even sexy<br />
I can only picture a teen using this<br />
Projects ok and lasts long <br />
Safe blind buy if you like youthful frags, you're new in this hobby and do not have anything "gourmand-y" in your collection<br />
My wife loves it but I'm pretty sure it's because we met in 2013<br />
Might sell it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2026047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2026047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2023023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2023023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2022177" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Louismanuel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/796916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.796916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Louismanuel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Homme-Oud-Noir-17338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Homme Oud Noir"title="Versace Pour Homme Oud Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2022177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2022177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/796916">Louismanuel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 05:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I truly envy the people that smell coffee on this one.<br />
We have coffee in house. My wife uses coffee beans but neither Brasilian nor Columbian smell like anything in this fragrance.<br />
Myself, I drink Nescafe instant coffee and Latte Macchiatto, but Halloween Man X doesn't smell like that.<br />
Not even the sweeter Nescafe Mokka or Caramel smell like it. <br />
Now, on the later, if you like the scent on you, I can not imagine that but Coffee Addict by Theodoros Kalotinis does smell like Nescafe Caramel Latte.<br />
<br />
IMO Halloween Man X lacks even more the scent of coffee than Salvatore Ferragamo Signature Uomo does.<br />
Both over hyped fragrances that don't live up to the expectations.<br />
<br />
Halloween Man X maybe worth the price. It sits close on my skin but does last 10-12 hours.<br />
Smell wise, there are a zillion in this category but also plenty better. Even for about the same price or lesser.<br />
Game om by Cristiano Ronaldo for example. Not that they are identical/similar. <br />
<br />
It was on my want (to test) list as I was looking for coffee based fragrances. I tested it last Spring in Spain and wasn't impressed but forgot the take it off the list. It was given to me as a Christmas present by my wife, I guess for the simple reason that it was by far the cheapest on my list. Lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2022177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2022177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2019742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2019742" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eazymoneysniper"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="eazymoneysniper" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Wulong-Cha-X-80465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wulong Cha X"title="Wulong Cha X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2019742ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2019742" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947924">eazymoneysniper</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 03:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is the type of dark fragrance i would wear when i dont wanna try too hard. for a coffee-shop scent at around $40 this fragrance over justifies the price<br />
<br />
though when it's first sprayed, the coffee note is quite sour, but it's barely noticeable after 5 minutes<br />
as it dries down it gets sweeter, vanilla powdery-ish scent starts to kick in<br />
its a warm fragrance with a dash of spices and just a little bit of smokiness<br />
this does NOT smell like a shower gel in anyway <br />
<br />
lasts a good 7+ hours with 2 hours or so projection<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2019742"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2019742#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andresazol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1881503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andresazol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1881503">Andresazol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 17:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>perfect fragrance for the price, long lasting, sweet sexy fragrance, reminds me a lot of SWY EDT but with aromatic and coffee notes, coffee doesnt smell bitter or cheap as some people say. Perfect for the price and love the smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2010525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2010525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2009105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2009105" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dimmuburger"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dimmuburger" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2009105ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2009105" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); So poorly blended... it smells like a generic cheap blue fragrance PLUS a lousy coffee note laid overtop. It's not a coffee fragrance - it is a mid frag with this poor aura of coffee that follows along miserably next to it. I guess for the price it wouldn't hurt to buy it and figure it out for yourself.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2009105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2009105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008963" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Scent is heavenly and better suited for dating than clubbing since it's not strong enough for it in my opinion. Lavender, lemon, and bright blue opening, coffee is only present until the mid and dry down, I don't understand how people don't smell the note accord but it's very intensely there. This is very sexy, alluring and relaxed, wear this if you want to make someone fall in love with you. Price is amazing, just get it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2008321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2008321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004422" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Eliyyahu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Eliyyahu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53215.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halloween Man X"title="Halloween Man X"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1887156">Eliyyahu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 11:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is pretty nice for the price although the hype is making It rise. I think this fragrance deserves the hype but there isn't as much coffee in it as everyone says it's a tough note to pick up in this so don't get this if you are looking for a coffee fragrance. The longevity and projection is decent about 1.5 feet of projection and 7-8 hours of longevity with the first 2-3 projecting pretty well. This smells warm and spicy with some amber and a tiny bit of cinnamon and coffee with some tonka bean and vanilla with cardamom and lemon in the opening which can be somewhat offputting at first but I got used to it, this fragrance can be a bit synthetic but with time it gets a bit better overall I give this fragrance an 8.2 out of 10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I like this way more than I expected I would. Very nice, fresh opening. I have been putting off getting some of the YouTuber hype fragrances, such as this one. Did not disappoint. I will absolutely be happily wearing this. Paid around $30 on FragranceBuy for a tester with cap. Still need to give it some full wearings.<br />
<br />
The coffee note doesn't come in until much later in the dry down. This really smells more like a summer freshy.<br />
<br />
2-19-24<br />
I still really like this. A sweet, fresh invigorating coffee-ish scent. So nice for the price! I wore it today and was instantly reminded of how much I like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2004295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2004295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
