H muitas notas diferentes, mas eu s sinto isso,  um perfume bem confortvel e um pouco maduro, se comparado aos perfumes achicletados e abaunilhados atuais.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2003845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2003845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002567" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002567" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-16">12/16/23 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had no idea what to expect with this scent, and I have to say that I'm pleasantly surprised.<br />
<br />
The opening is sweet but not in a sour or synthetic way. The first whiff had a vanilla-y scent (likely from the whiskey, lavender, and amber notes) that reminds me of popular scents like PR Invictus or 1 million and to a lesser extent, Le Male and Eros. Essentially, this has quality of scents that are much higher in price.<br />
<br />
I found it dries down pretty quickly, and you're left with a sweet, nutty scent from the lavender and coffee.<br />
<br />
Altogether this is a surprisingly nice budget scent. Considering it smells nice (nothing amazing) and is very reasonable priced, I'll give it a 7.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="2002567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=2002567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994706" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cwavah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1280569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cwavah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1280569">cwavah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 23:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok fragrance , not loud</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1994706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1994706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1986930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1986930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J.Deft"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1362080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1362080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="J.Deft" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Profondo-59532.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59532.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Profondo"title="Acqua di Gi Profondo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1986930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1986930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1362080">J.Deft</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-27">11/27/23 21:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I will say this I liked this frag. Perfect for cooler night and cold weather in general. Slightly citrus up top and get immediately to the coffee note. On my skin the coffee note was strong, which made it headache inducing if I sprayed near my neck area. I would recommend this if you wanna smell like a walking talking cup of coffee with too much sugar.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1986930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1986930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980423" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980423" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ZeaMoore4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761519"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761519.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ZeaMoore4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Imaginary-Authors/A-City-On-Fire-29211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A City On Fire"title="A City On Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980423ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980423" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761519">ZeaMoore4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-19">11/19/23 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Be warned: The opening is terrible. After 15 minutes (ish) it becomes a great true coffee been scent, but at that point it's a skin scent on me. It's not a sweet coffee been, but like smelling rosted coffee from the bag. <br />
<br />
Ok for the price, but the opening is Rough and makes me reconsider every time I want a coffee scent. And i can't smell it unless i stick my nose on it after 30-45 minutes.<br />
I go 15 sprays and still it's a skin scent after 45 minutes.<br />
<br />
5/10. I like it, but the opening and very synthetic opening pulls of 1.5 points. Projection could be a lot better and draws 2 points of the score, but for the price it's ok.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1980423"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1980423#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972703" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972703" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kshir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585451"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1585451.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kshir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ajmal/Amber-Santal-55147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Santal"title="Amber Santal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972703ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972703" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1585451">Kshir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-09">11/09/23 13:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wonder how is this even categorized as a gourmand or winter frag. Don't get me wrong, it smells quite good but it is quite basic and misleading. All I am getting is the shower gel kind of freshness, which is a little darker in character, more like a deep blue kind of scent, with lavender and citrus as forward. The mid bring out a slight boozy accord which is backed with mellow cinnamon spiciness; but, even here the freshness from lavender is perceptible; and I get zero coffee and leather whatsoever from this. The drydown is amber heavy, which yet again gives it a sense of airiness and helps it maintain that freshness; and thus the scent doesn't ever really transition into that gourmand territory. I am really confused what this is trying to be and what picture is being painted in the community with this. <br />
Performance seems to be quite good and can be called slightly above average. I get a good longevity, about 5-6 hours on skin with good projection the first couple hours, not bad at all. Presentation is quite basic but solid, I like the simplicity overall; the atomizer is also decent and sprays a good burst.<br />
<br />
Overall, this is a pleasant find, but for me personally, this is quite forgetable. It is confused in its own existance and I honestly do not know what to make of it as it lacks a defining character. This is definitely not something I would wear in winters and it is not something I would look for in summer either, for the availablility of better freshies. This is a pass for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1972703"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1972703#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970943" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1970943" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Deekerr16"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1839985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Deekerr16" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1970943ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1970943" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1839985">Deekerr16</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-07">11/07/23 10:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's hailed as a great and affordable coffee scent, but it'd be best described as a coffee crisp bar coated in shower gel. The notes and descriptions would lead you to believe it's dark and sweet, but it's just another freshie - now with a weird synthetic coffee note smack dab in the middle. Not for coffee lovers, not for gourmand lovers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1970943"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1970943#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1970271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1970271" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Great99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220028.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Great99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Dua-Brand/Invasion-of-the-Barbers-86312.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.86312.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invasion of the Barbers"title="Invasion of the Barbers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1970271ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1970271" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220028">Great99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-06">11/06/23 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So this is certainly not a natural smelling creation.  I bought my BOTTLES when it was first released and inexpensive.  Reformulated?   I doubt it, since it was inexpensive to start.  My review is just to make two statements:<br />
-Still easily one of my most complimented scents (I know, I think its strange too)<br />
-Projection is beastly, so either wearers claiming otherwise went nose blind, or a reformulation.<br />
I dont think this is for everyone, and not a safe blind buy, but for myself it has always garnered positive attention.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1970271"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1970271#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1963114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1963114" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="carloscr92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1579192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="carloscr92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1963114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1963114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579192">carloscr92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-28">10/28/23 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me this was the first fragrance it smelled cheap and so synthetic, didnt like it, to me this is so overhyped, the only thing its true is that its cheap, but it smells cheap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1963114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1963114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1962958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Almost smells like rotten garbage to me. I'm going to get rid of it. Not a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1962958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1962958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1960583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1960583" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BBsss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BBsss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1960583ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1960583" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874419">BBsss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-25">10/25/23 10:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The delightful aroma of freshly brewed coffee embraced my senses for approximately four hours, gradually yielding to a captivating, sweet vanilla essence. This vanilla fragrance was reminiscent of a sumptuous scoop of velvety, gourmet vanilla ice cream, enticing and comforting in its likeness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1960583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1960583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1956169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1956169" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mfjuho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mfjuho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1956169ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1956169" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1869104">mfjuho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-19">10/19/23 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Before I got this I was hyped because I like coffee and thought to myself "Yes finally I've found a coffee fragrance, and its other notes look nice aswell". But when I got this I tried to bring myself to wear this I just couldn't, I never expected how difficult a coffee fragrance can be to wear. I don't wanna be outside smelling like I poured roasted coffee beans on myself.<br />
<br />
I've tried Maison Martin Margiela's coffee break which was way more wearable, although with limited performance and more expensive. That one is the one I'd still recommend over this for a coffee frag. It smells more like a milky latte coffee with a lot of lavender which is just so much more wearable.<br />
<br />
If you are able to pull this off congrats, I just can't<br />
Price is great nonetheless</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1956169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1956169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabeyondobsessedemperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabeyondobsessedemperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152">dabeyondobsessedemperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-18">10/18/23 04:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, I don't have a full-sized bottle, because I've had other fragrances I wanted to prioritize buying, but I recently found a sample size of Halloween Man X in my drawer, and decided to try it on. My verdict: this might be one of the top-tier masculine coffee fragrances out there, and almost definitely the nicest in its price range. It projects off your skin like a beautiful, dewey morning at a minimalist caf - there's the scent of dark, rich, freshly-brewed Americano coffee, spiced with powdery cardamom in the opening, and further deepened with smoky incense and sweet, sensual tonka bean as the drydown closes in. It's beautifully robust, and while the coffee note might be a bit synthetic at first, it's enhanced by some more natural-feeling background notes. As for performance, it's not the greatest, with longevity and sillage being moderate at best (at least on my skin), but it's honestly more than acceptable for around 35 to 40 bucks. In terms of usage, I'd only be reaching for Halloween Man X during colder months. Though my most frequent use for it would be for early mornings after sleep-deprived nights, since the smell of coffee is an invigorating energizer for me, and this coffee-heavy fragrance sets the perfect tone to wake my body, mind and soul up. <br />
Bottom line: I do love this take on a coffee fragrance, with a bit of a darker vibe. It's a bit harsh at first, yet in a nice way. It's extremely mass-appealing, beautifully crafted for its price, and one of the best value fragrances out there in my opinion. If you're into coffee fragrances, get this one, as it's truly a great option for any and every budget.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1954826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1954826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954628" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhobosFragfrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhobosFragfrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864052">PhobosFragfrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 21:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought this and I LOVE it one of my favorite in my collection truthfully I get 0 coffee scent from this and the only things I can really pick up is very calming sweet almost bubblegum candy like scent with a nice subtle hint of freshness. has decent projection for the first hour and 45 minutes but after that it becomes a slightly more subtle intimate sent and after 2 hours and 30 minutes its very little projection. Lasts around 4 hours for me not many fragrances last long on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1954628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1954628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1954560" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1954560" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nibolis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663625"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1663625.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nibolis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1954560ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1954560" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663625">nibolis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-17">10/17/23 18:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>bad opening and okay drydown<br />
opening is a very weird mixture of citruses, coffee, cardamom and lavender<br />

nice longevity but weak projection<br />
for me its a 4</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1954560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1954560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1953434" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-Neo-93090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93090.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness Neo"title="Oud for Greatness Neo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1953434ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1953434" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-16">10/16/23 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably the most hyped fragrance from Halloween. I've seen this one on numerous top 10's list by other reviewers that say it's a great cheapie to add to the collection. Found this at an online discounter for around $30, so I figured "Why not?". Here's how it went;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is a warm, sweet, and spicy blast of coffee. The coffee note is instantly recognizable, followed by a decent dose of cardamom and a little touch of brightness from the lemon and lavender. In the dry down the coffee is still the strongest note, but you also get sweetness from the tonka and amber along with a small amount of leather, whiskey, and cinnamon. I also get a little bit of a chocolate vibe as well, but it's probably just a combination of the other notes doing that. The coffee really overpowers everything else though. I don't get any of the mineral or incense notes. The comparisons to Salvatore Ferragamo's Uomo Signature are pretty spot on, it's a very close match. Also, the comparisons to Axe's Dark Temptation are pretty close too.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is strong at around 6 feet. Sillage is strong as well, leaving an easily noticeable scent trail. After a few hours the projection was still about arms length and there was still a slightly noticeable scent trail. Altogether the scent lasted on my skin around 10 hours. Not bad for a cheapie.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is definitely a fall/winter fragrance, most suited for night time wear. This is not an office friendly fragrance.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
I would call this blind buy worthy if you like the smell of coffee. There's nothing particularly polarizing or divisive about the scent, so I can't imagine many people thinking it would smell offensive. The performance is good as well, so you wont be disappointed in the purchase.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
This is a good fragrance, especially for the price point. Here's the thing; the scent profile is so similar to Ferragamo's Uomo Signature, and I think Uomo Signature does a better job overall. Also, as of right now, Uomo Signature is actually cheaper than Man X. They're both great picks honestly, and I don't think anyone would be disappointed with either. But all things considered, I'd recommend Uomo Signature over Man X just because of the performance and the price.<br />
<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1953434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1953434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952367" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952367" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Carlos.ms_15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1865334"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Carlos.ms_15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952367ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952367" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); Don't reccomend to wear at dates for dates wear something like jpg le male elixir wich is sweet sexy and insane performance wise. Halloween man x is great value for money, top 5 for its price imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1952367"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1952367#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a compilemt getter, and losg lasting. Good for dating and night life.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1942306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1942306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939529" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1665129">Angelbeast56</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-23">09/23/23 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WowI found this fragrance in discount for 20$ and heard amazing things about it so I impulses bought it and all I have to say is thats its amazing! Opens up fresh with sweet citrus and lavender reminds me a bit of ultramale and invictus with some Eros in there but smashed together and with a bunch of coffee added to it in the opening you smell that coffee in the backround then towards the middle its more sweet spicy and more coffee is prominent then once it dries it smells like a sweet vanilla latte super versatile and can be worn in warm days and cold days anywhere you want and last me a little more that 8 hours and pretty decent projection definitely going to run through my bottle very fast this winter </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I also tried Ferragamo uomo signature. To me Halloween X smells better because I prefer amber as a base versus vanilla. <br />
About the same projection and lasting power. If you prefer vanilla over amber then by all means get Signature. X seems to be a few bucks cheaper. The coffee note is a bit more powerful in signature. Hope this helps.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1932993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1932993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1931562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1931562" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lulu3232"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1661152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lulu3232" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1931562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1931562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661152">lulu3232</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-19">09/19/23 00:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, youthful, with good sillage, the coffee note is pretty prominent and noticeable, it feels like a good deal due to the price, however I don't enjoy this much as I would like. It is so synthetic and not interesting at all... <br />
<br />
I fell into the trap of listening to tiktok reviewers recommending this without testing further, my opinion is that it is better to save for a more expensive winter / going out fragrance rather than getting this. It is very cheap smelling, you'd be better off with a Chocolate Axe spray tbh. <br />
<br />
I bought a two bottle package that it thought was a good deal, but ended up gifting one bottle to a friend because i was tired of it. The other one is still with me but I'm really thinking how to get rid of it because I'm not using this anymore. You could try it but honestly you are not missing that much so please save your time and money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1931562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1931562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1928810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1680277">Rikikiki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-15">09/15/23 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Do not buy into the hype. This is an incredibly cheap smelling cologne. The lavender smells cheap, the coffee smells like used sour coffee grounds, and the sweetness is synthetic as hell. On my skin it just smells like used coffee grounds in the dry down. You're better off buying rochas man or rochas man intense if you want an affordable lavender vanilla coffee scent. Rochas man is very smooth and well blended and comforting. Halloween man x is just an overly sweet chemical mess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1928810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1928810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Mine has horrible performance too for some reason.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1920032"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1920032#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920025" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I dont like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1920025"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1920025#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The coffee note is very cloying and doesnt blend well with the cardamom and this fragrance seems to get sweeter and sweeter until it dries down. The dry down is okay, its a lot more balanced than the opening but this fragrance is still very bad. 4.3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1908689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1908689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903080" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; After wearing this awhile I was put off by a peppery concrete skin scent as well. This isnt terrible, I was just expecting so much more. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1897985" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaxFragrance19"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaxFragrance19" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1897985ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1897985" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795049">MaxFragrance19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-09">08/09/23 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a really nice fall/winter fragrance. It's a dark coffee fragrance, the opening is similar to The Most Wanted Intense, but the dry downs are entirely different. Now, by people hearing it smells like coffee they MAY expect it to smell like a "Frappuccino" which is DOES NOT smell like. Overall its a great fragrance and blind buy worthy. 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1897985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1897985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1888630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1888630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1888630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1879752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1879752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JayLee29"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208269"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1208269.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JayLee29" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1879752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1879752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1208269">JayLee29</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-15">07/15/23 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I needed a quality coffee frag and at the price point this fits that bill right now. I do really like this. It is amazing? Not quite, but its good enough to buy a bottle for sure. It does seem a bit overpriced and somewhat overhyped for the type of quality you get here but if you need a sexy coffee frag it def fits. My only issue is its a little scratchy in some areas as far as overall quality. I guess meaning its not the highest amount of depth to it and its somewhat linear. The sweetness that backs up the coffee is slightly cloying. But overall its good enough if you need a mid priced coffee scent that wont break the bank<br />
<br />
It resembles Ferragamo uomo a lot. Like 75% close to that but I do think the coffee note in this one is much better than that one. This one smells more like real coffee. Its dark but sweet at the same time and just very good. Very mass appealing and sexy. It also resembles rich warm addictive from Zara slightly in its sticky sweetness, but obviously this is much higher quality <br />
<br />
Date night scent for sure but also very versatile. Could wear it to just about any occasion outside of formal and the gym <br />
<br />
Performance is above average. Projection is not beast but silage is nice and it does last around 7-8 hours or a little longer on my skin<br />
<br />
A fall/winter scent but again pretty versatile <br />
<br />
Any age can pull this off but I think it suits young guys in their twenties or early thirties best. It has a youthful vibe despite coffe notes in general being fairly mature <br />
<br />
scent-8/10<br />
value-5/10<br />
uniqueness-6.5/10<br />
performance-5.5/10<br />
overall-7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1879752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1879752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1878490" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1878490" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1878490ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1878490" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-14">07/14/23 07:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#165 in my "Tour de Fragrance", a sample from Microperfumes, and glad I didn't blind buy a bottle of it. It's not awful, but the very prominent coffee note just seems odd and out of place. I love coffee, but smelling like it probably isn't going to draw a lot of positive notice since I hang out in a coffee shop a lot where that scent will just blend in. That's where I'm headed now, and if I had the time, I'd scrub this off. There is certainly nothing sensual or alluring about it. Can't recommend this one.<br />
Update: The spice and coffee disappear after about fifteen minutes. What's left is vanilla, tonka and a hint of cinnamon. I have a number of scents with this profile already, so still not buying it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1878490"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1878490#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1874812" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Detman101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Detman101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Jasoor-85093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasoor"title="Jasoor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1874812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1874812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-09">07/09/23 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The composition of this is wholly a mess.<br />
This is a Bleu fragrance.... With a ton of coffee added in the opening with some kind of earthy mineralic note added in the finish.<br />
<br />
I have tried to wear this abomination for 2 years now, never making it past 25% of the 4.2oz bottle being used. Every time i wear it, i run for the shower. <br />
<br />
I just...dont...like it.<br />
I'm buying a proper creamy coffee scent and putting this on the "for sale" shelf. <br />
I can't wear this... And I'm done trying.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1874812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1874812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1870389" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The overall smell is smooth and really nice to smell. No note in particular overwhelms your nose(for me). Kinda reminds me of a cozy barn where an old and nice grandpa would make leather. Imo its inoffensive and doesn't protrude your olfactory system but rathers eases into it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1870389"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1870389#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1870377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1689596">ZephyrDavid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 02:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Underrated gem!<br />
Not synthetic at all.<br />
Fresh warm spicy from the top notes. <br />
Boozie, sweet, creamy and smooth from the middle and the base! Not overly sweet so it is very well-balanced. The coffee note is noticeable and its very pleasant. <br />
For the price is a better option than other clones or Middle Eastern fragrances!<br />
So so good!! I really like it!<br />
Spray on both skin and clothes, because it hits differently. And if you combined it you will be amazed.<br />
You can easily wear this in the summertime at under 25 celsius degrees.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1866285"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1866285#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
