<br />
Only blind buy if you love the smell of coffee and are willing to overspray / reapply a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1843323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1843323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1833222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1833222" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="auztie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="auztie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1833222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1833222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556309">auztie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-14">05/14/23 21:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Liked it alot more when I first got it. 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1833222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1833222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831226" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JeanPierree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1724881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JeanPierree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724881">JeanPierree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 06:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I did blind buy this. Quite a few reviews here say it has a strong coffee smell. It is the most prominent note but it's mixed with an overall background of sweetness. And when I say coffee think Lynx Dark Temptation or a lighter/cheaper coffee smell, not dark/strong ground natural coffee beans if that's what you're looking for.<br />
<br />
Only suitable for colder weather. Sweeter coffee scent. I would not recommend blind buying just for the hype.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1831226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1831226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
mainly coffee smell with some vanilla detectable.<br />
dry down is really nice, the vanilla comes out some more<br />
<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824442" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="poltergeist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1720677.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="poltergeist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720677">poltergeist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 01:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update. I like Halloween Man X better when I layer it with my Geurlain L'Homme Ideal Extreme. 1:1 sprays. I think they compliment each other quite nicely. Geurlain is almost too rich by itself while HWMX is too simplistic with it's forward musky-gourmandy note. BR540 Extrait is still my favorite of the few expensive fragrances I've put my nose to...got like 5 dupes of it coming to try along with testers of Portrait of a Lady, Dior Homme Intense, and a couple others to see what all the fuss is about. I really want to see what all the hype is about Dior Homme Parfum, but apparently it's near impossible to get.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1824442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1824442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819660" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338418">Stinky whiskey Buttons</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 00:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yo start off lets get this out off the way, its nothing like Uomo intens or Uomo by salvatore except the have a coffe note in the listing<br />
<br />
This is a Blue scent in the core, it reminds you off scents such as Bad boy and Axe. Nothing really special about it except a peppery sour coffe note, its not bad smelling, but its nothing special, will give it propps for beeing the blueprint for badboy and other recent generic male perfumes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1819509" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="poltergeist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720677"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1720677.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="poltergeist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1819509ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1819509" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720677">poltergeist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-27">04/27/23 19:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my halloween man x today. Smells better when sprayed on clothing than on skin. It's too powdery smelling on my skin. On my shirt it's decent. I'm not getting any coffee or anything like that. Just smells like light, airy, sweet caramel/vanilla. It's a fresher scent than i expected. A woman could definitely wear this. It's ok, maybe to wear outside on a spring or summer evening. Maybe if it macerates for a while it will change for the better and the 'coffee' will come through more. Time will tell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1819509"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1819509#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818426" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1818426" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SneezeNose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1713691.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SneezeNose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1818426ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1818426" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713691">SneezeNose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-26">04/26/23 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one took a while to like. Definitely not for everyone. <br />
Sample before you buy if you can. <br />
<br />
Synthetic Fresh spicy opening with whiskey, lemon &amp; cardamom. <br />
<br />
Then drys down to mainly a raw roasted coffee, Tonka bean, leather and amber. <br />
<br />
This fragrance has similar opening to Azzaro the most wanted or SWY Armani but drys down way different from those. Overall 7.5 out of 10. Performance and quality could be better but its a cheapie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1818426"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1818426#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1809216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheLotusEffect"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheLotusEffect" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1809216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1809216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1667512">TheLotusEffect</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-14">04/14/23 22:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought into the hype and not into it at all. At least it was cheap. <br />
<br />
Super synthetic and cheap smelling from the get go and can never shake it. I have plenty of cheapies I love but this ain't it chief. <br />
Starts with a cloying, synthetic sweetness that was really off-putting for me.<br />
The coffee really comes through, but in the worst way possible - reeked of acrid spoiled coffee. Almost like someone spilled a cafe au lait on a leather couch and let it fester. <br />
Dry down isn't terrible, but really generic ambery, tonka feel.<br />
<br />
Maybe it's just how it dries down on my skin, gonna let it macerate for a few months and try it a few more times later, but as of now just awful on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1809216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1809216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1808005" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1808005" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NecessaryExistence"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1698822.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NecessaryExistence" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1808005ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1808005" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698822">NecessaryExistence</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-13">04/13/23 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is ok, but it just isnt for me. I definitely get tonka, coffee and some cardamom. The coffee reminds me of cheap instant coffee, but not in a bad way. I dont find it too sweet. I can see people liking this for sure, its really good for the price. To me, though, it just smells a little too synthetic and doesnt quite fit my age (Im in my 30s) or personality. It would definitely suit someone in their twenties. Decent casual scent appropriate for a fun night out in cool weather.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1808005"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1808005#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1804141" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1804141" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="willnpc40"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="willnpc40" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1804141ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1804141" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234823">willnpc40</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice surprise with this one. I recently bought Stronger with you Intensely and Absolutely in which this has similarities to this. It also has similarities to Azzaro The Most Wanted and Parfum edition. Yet this is 1/3 the price of those 4, so if your are on a budget this is a great alternative.<br />
<br />
7/10 - Nice scent on a budget</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1804141"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1804141#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802618" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BrilloPadLover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1433593.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BrilloPadLover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Uden-6306.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6306.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Uden"title="Uden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1433593">BrilloPadLover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-06">04/06/23 21:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got caught up in the hype of this product, the description made it sound like the perfect combination of rum, coffee, and whiskey, so how could it not be amazing? However, when I tried it, all I could smell was coffee, and to be honest, the coffee scent was a little off. It's not terrible, especially for the price, but it's not something I would want to keep in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1802618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1802618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1802317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1802317" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ThatBlindbuyGuy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722305"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722305.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ThatBlindbuyGuy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Qaed-Al-Fursan-67996.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67996.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Qaed Al Fursan"title="Qaed Al Fursan"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1802317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1802317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722305">ThatBlindbuyGuy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-06">04/06/23 13:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my opinion this is a good cheapie, it opens with a similar vibe to Eros EdT but quickly starts to change direction as it goes more like caramel with a blend of cardamom, lavender and mineral notes with a dark coffee underbelly that makes me think of drinking a caramel cappuccino sat by a swimming pool and you can smell both the drink and the pool in the air, in a good way. <br />
I don't get any whisky from this, nor any leather. The main notes I smell are caramel/toffee, mineral notes and crushed coffee beans, the lavender is also there but if isn't easy to smell it as a seperate note it sort of gives the overall fragrance a more creamy vibe. As this dries down you smell more of the crushed coffee beans note which some may not like as it is bitter. <br />
Longevity and performance on skin is above average for an eau de toilette, overall for its price point it is a solid 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1802317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1802317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800589" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1800589" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="M4lkavian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638423"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1638423.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="M4lkavian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1800589ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1800589" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1638423">M4lkavian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-04">04/04/23 16:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Want to smell like stale whiskey and cheap coffee whilst wearing a leather jacket? Then this is the scent for you.<br />
<br />
It's a very synthetic scent, but relatively enjoyable as a guy. Girls will either think you smell like a bad boy in a leather jacket. Or a bum that spills his two bevarages of choice - whiskey and coffee all over himself every day.<br />
<br />
I'd describe this more as an early to mid 20s scent for a guy. Purchased a 125ml bottle for 35 back in 2022. Price has since gone up, at around 50 depending on where you buy. Not worth it due to the price hike imo.<br />
<br />
Definitley an evening / cool weather fragrance.<br />
<br />
@ 35 /125ml i'd rate this a 6/10<br />
@ 50+ /125ml, i'd rate this a 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1800589"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1800589#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1795964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening is sweet and fresh and then quickly dries down to the boozy-coffee after tones. Brilliant.<br />

But Im with some of the other reviewers. All I got up front was sweet.   Bubble gum and baby powder sweet. Dont get me wrong  it was pleasant. But I didnt pick up even a hint of coffee until at least two to three hours of dry down. All in all, a very pleasant sweet smell on my skin.  Wouldnt pay more than $40 for it, but if the price is right, I may pick up a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1792772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1792772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788911" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Amazing frag for the cooler weather 8 hours longevity, projection for about 2 of those.<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1782695" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelllessperson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646120"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1646120.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelllessperson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1782695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1782695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646120">smelllessperson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-13">03/13/23 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pure coffee smell. This fragrance is for cold weather and night use, don't use it in a hot day nor expose yourself to the sun while using it because you ain't gonna like what you'll smell to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1782695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1782695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1782682" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1782682" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cball45"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261528.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cball45" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/For-Him-2022-78047.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78047.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="For Him 2022"title="For Him 2022"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1782682ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1782682" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1782682"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1782682#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1781128" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1781128" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sora-Dora/Vanuatu-75829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanuatu"title="Vanuatu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1781128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1781128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1197261">Nula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-11">03/11/23 14:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The version I just got of Man X Halloween from MicroPerfume smells like it was made for little girls to share with their dollies. It is sweet and powdery like doll plastic sometimes is scented. Wth?<br />
Definitely for the female under 10 set: tea parties, father daughter dances, &amp; shopping with auntie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1781128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1781128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1780205" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Can come across very cloying and sweet...save up and buy something more high end.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1780205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1780205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1779753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1779753" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FiveOfCups"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1686219"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1686219.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FiveOfCups" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1779753ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1779753" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1686219">FiveOfCups</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-10">03/10/23 00:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So, it's no secret I'm a fan of the holiday Halloween. And when I was a bit short on free shipping on a reputable fragrance site I blind bought this merely on the name alone.<br />
<br />
Upon initial spray you are welcomed by a wonderfully unique scent that honestly to me has zero notes of coffee but heavily of tonka bean a sweetness of perhaps vanilla and warm spices. I loved it but within the first hours it dries down into a women's musky perfume that I can't as yet put my finger on. Which isn't the worst thing..but I am not a fan of smelling like my mother.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1779753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1779753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1777774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's going to be like TK-9336, sampants, LMBelvi  and other said.<br />
Smells exactly like axe Dark Temptation, I know I returned it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1776556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1776556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771734" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Osmologist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Osmologist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Costa-Brazil/Aroma-74527.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74527.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aroma"title="Aroma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1425714">Osmologist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-28">02/28/23 17:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lemon lavender mineral notes gives it a blue opening which you wouldn't really expect. Then all you get is a weak cardomom incense which is average. No whiskey, no coffee, no leather and some cheap aroma chemical that pretends to be amber but doesn't really have that ambery warmth or sweetness. Tired DNA that really for the price you couldn't complain, but for the price there are more original and distinguishable scents out there. This is one where your curiosity after reading the notes will be disappointed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1771734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1771734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1769895" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1769895" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NeoRaider"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NeoRaider" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1769895ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1769895" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1227805">NeoRaider</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-26">02/26/23 11:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got it today as a gift and i would say that it's ok. It's definitely not a safe blind buy i would say but it's also not very expensive so... yeah. To me it's very similar to Night Pour Homme III and Gourmand Leather from Zara type of fragrance. I personally don't get coffee, maybe a little bit in the dry-down. It's good but imo. not anything amazing. Performance is VERY good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1769895"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1769895#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1763029" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1763029" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joalo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joalo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Brioni/Brioni-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-69857.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69857.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Brioni Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Brioni Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1763029ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1763029" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1244493">Joalo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-18">02/18/23 06:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Good sweet fragrance and long lasting, but coffee note is not heavy, I prefer feragamo Uomo intense more than this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1763029"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1763029#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="53215" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1306970" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1306970" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kylenicholson94"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1056804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kylenicholson94" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1306970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1306970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1056804">kylenicholson94</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-13">03/13/21 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Halloween Man X to me is a hybrid of so many other fragrances. Ironically it is a Frankenstein DNA, which fits the name "Halloween" perfectly on this occasion.<br />
<br />
I'll list the scents you may find this similar to/worth comparing with.<br />
<br />
1) Axe/Lynx Dark Temptation - Yes it does.<br />
The shower gel and chocolate soap DNA is quite noticeable in the opening.<br />
It's a shame Halloween Man X will and does get a lot of hate based on this, as Dark Temptation isn't actually a bad smell.<br />
It just has the bad stigma attached to it, thanks to it being overworn by teenagers instead of using soap &amp; water, and gym changing rooms literally tasting of the stuff. But putting all that aside, is it a bad smell? I don't think so, however If you think yes, you may want to pass on this.<br />
<br />
2) Ferragamo Uomo - The creamy tiramisu king.<br />
The real similarity here contributing to the Frankenstein DNA courtesy of Salvatore F. Is the creamy dessert like texture.<br />
Picture the tiramisu from Uomo, now picture it wasnt made professionally, it was made by your aunt who likes to add too much cocoa powder and coffee.<br />
<br />
3) Versace Eros - this is more of a "if you try really hard you can detect some Eros" situation. However, they do share a slightly similar Tonka Bean note.<br />
<br />
4) Michael Jordan Legend - definitely leans more towards this and not Rochas Man.<br />
This is the important comparison in terms of "Do I need Halloween Man X if I have Legend".<br />
I would say No, Legend ticks all of the same boxes on paper as Halloween Man X.<br />
We're talking the situations you'd wear it, affordability, scent profile with the coffee and sweetness, juice quality and finally performance, but the list could continue.<br />
If you're a hard-core collector with a lot of spare change, don't let me stop you though. This is the better frag than Legend in my opinion.<br />
<br />
5) Roasted Coffee Bean - Yes, actual real life coffee. More specifically, if you have your coffee roasted, you've just drank it all &amp; then sniff the bottom of the cup (for research purposes...), then you've just gotten an idea of how the far drydown smells.<br />
<br />
Overall, its a Like not a Love, BUT if you like the sound of the above and you do well with setting your expectations when imagining a scent based on description alone, then it is blind buy worthy for the price.<br />
<br />
Performance is average, you won't be blown away nor disappointed. It does its job and then clocks off when it's finished, no overtime for Mr Frankenstein.<br />
<br />
I hope this helps!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1306970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1306970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1457708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1457708" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jcberedo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395966"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1395966.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jcberedo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Orto-Parisi/Megamare-53471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Megamare"title="Megamare"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1457708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1457708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1395966">jcberedo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-05">12/05/21 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ladies magnet.<br />
<br />
I was wearing this in the grocery and some ladies kept on following me and just stayed near my back. <br />
Halloween Man X does rock in action!<br />
They don't compliment you but they keep on being near you. Action speaks louder than words.<br />
<br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Longevity 8/10<br />
Sillage 7/10<br />
Price 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1457708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1457708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1448908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1448908" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="big_ez95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1353640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="big_ez95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1448908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1448908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1353640">big_ez95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-19">11/19/21 15:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Personally, I dont care for how it smells. But this is quickly becoming one of the most complimented fragrances I wear. I have been getting people just stopping group convos to announce someone here smells good and straight up compliments from people I meet with this one on. Worth the try given the price easily.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1448908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1448908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1217683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1217683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AMajeedQT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.30910.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AMajeedQT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Korloff-Paris/Rose-Oud-52106.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52106.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Oud"title="Rose Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1217683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1217683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/30910">AMajeedQT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-29">08/29/20 14:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fragrance with arguably the best coffee note!<br />
<br />
I've looked hard and long, niche and designer, for a fragrance with a decent coffee note and I didn't find anything that scratches the coffee itch.<br />
<br />
Along comes this affordable creation from a relatively-small house with almost no hype behind it and pulls the sword from the rock when much bigger competitors couldn't.<br />
<br />
Halloween Man X is beautiful fragrance. Prominent coffee note, mixed with warm cinnamon, sweet vanillic tonka, and boozy whiskey to create this sweet yet rich coffee aroma.<br />
<br />
The coffee note is gorgeous and well done. Smell like roasted coffee beans. A proper espresso shot!<br />
<br />
If you take the coffee note away, you get a somewhat generic sweet tonka scent that you find in so many fragrances. A smell that while generic, still very mass appealing and well-complimented. Add coffee and it becomes a gorgeous scent.<br />
<br />
Halloween Man X smells like you've worn Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely or any of Uomo/Uomo Signature by Salvatore Ferragamo and walked into a coffee shop. Your fragrance mixed with the shop's coffee aroma and smells like Halloween Man X.<br />
<br />
I am very happy that I found this. However, my wife seemed less pleased: "I definitely smell the coffee but I don't think I want that in my perfumes". At least she smells the coffee!<br />
<br />
Excellent job Nicolas Beaulieuu. Well done Halloween.<br />
<br />
This coffee treat is suitable for cooler weather and more on the mature side. I "Love" it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1217683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1217683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1150782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1150782" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rtiggs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1168831"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rtiggs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jay-Z/Gold-21938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.21938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold"title="Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1150782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1150782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1168831">Rtiggs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-29">02/29/20 21:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can't say anything more that has already been said in the positive. It's great. Smell is 100% nice a nd is blind buy yes mode. <br />
<br />
I guess you must like coffee scents. I love this stuff!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1150782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1150782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="53215" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
