</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1479363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1479363" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CheapFragHead"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CheapFragHead" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1479363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1479363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1223662">CheapFragHead</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-08">01/08/22 23:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a horrible, screechy, synthetic chemical mess.  The coffee note does not smell like a good cup of coffee.  It smells like cheap sour coffee and that sour coffee note is the dominant note in the fragrance from opening to dry down.  This smells like a lower quality version of Eros with bad dominating sour coffee note.  Yuck!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1479363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1479363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1442477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1442477" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TK-9336"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1400722"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TK-9336" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1442477ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1442477" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1400722">TK-9336</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-08">11/08/21 15:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to love this and get a cheapie coffee frag in my collection. Total and utter disappointment. Absolutely no projection, it was dull and barely lifted from my skin. The coffee note is kinda there, and got slightly better in the dry down, but it was barely detectable on my skin. Returned my bottle. With so many better performing fragrances save your money and get something that actually performs. Over-hyped, and a great cheapie in contrast was Mercedes-Benz Club Black. The search for a good coffee frag continues. My batch code was M11751.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1442477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1442477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1506900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1506900" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honkymagoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376547"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1376547.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honkymagoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1506900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1506900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376547">Honkymagoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-18">02/18/22 07:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Definitely NOT a blind buy. I love coffee but the coffee note in this is just not for me. It's more like a cheap coffee that spilled on your carpet a few weeks ago and wasn't cleaned up properly. Stale and uninviting. The only thing really making this wearable right now is that I sprayed YSL Homme on my neck and HMX on my wrist. The Homme's sweetness covers the sour / bitter coffee coming off my wrists. Thankfully I got this on discount but I'm probably gonna get rid of my bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1506900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1506900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1261875" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1261875" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sampants"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263519"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263519.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sampants" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roccobarocco/Extraordinary-for-Men-14864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Extraordinary for Men"title="Extraordinary for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1261875ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1261875" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263519">sampants</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-16">12/16/20 14:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Chocolate axe. That's it, that's the review. I don't know what dry down everyone else is talking about, every time you get a whiff of it on yourself it just has this cloying, teen body spray smell to it. I wanted to give it a chance. I wore it for a couple days to hopefully smell this "coffee" dry down everyone else seems to get but my nose just can't get passed chocolate axe. It can't be my skin chemistry because I sprayed on my clothes too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1261875"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1261875#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1352410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1352410" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doikl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="doikl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1352410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1352410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342379">doikl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-31">05/31/21 23:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy sweet/gourmand fragrances but HMX is disappointing. It's Versace Eros with a strong dose of cheap chocolate deodorant which makes it borderline unwearable for me personally. Agree with others below that the coffee note is hard to detect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="53215"comment_id="1352410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Halloween/Halloween-Man-X-53215.html?ccid=1352410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="53215" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

            <span class="brand">Etat Libre d'Orange</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Story of Your Life</span>

            <em>SpicyWarmAmber</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.2128262.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/21585/news.21585-60x64.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/news/My-Beloved-Mona-di-Orio-21585.html#cc276269"><span class="link-span"></span>
                        <span class="ztworowseclipse">My Beloved Mona di Orio</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"

        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>
                            <div style="clear: bottom; margin-top: 1rem;"></div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });

</script>
